amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: \ SEC. __. Total appropriations made in this Act (other than appropriations required to be made by a provision of law) are hereby reduced by $1,425,000,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce total appropriations by $1,425,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hefley amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 79 - 333 (Roll no. 428).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A018) offered by Mr. Hefley.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
